title: Chocolate orange sponge cake
description: Ingrid decorated this chocolate and orange layer cake using a stencil of Paul Hollywood’s face, but you can use a stencil of your own choosing or just leave off the fondant layer.
ingredients: 3 tsp cocoa powder, plus extra for coating the tins
200g/7oz dark chocolate (at least 70% cocoa solids), chopped
400g/1lb ready to roll chocolate flavoured fondant icing
